text: Sancey is a commune. It is in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in the Doubs department in east France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2016 and consists of the former communes of Sancey-le-Grand (the seat) and Sancey-le-Long.Arrêté préfectoral 23 September 2015 == References == Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Doubs
title: Sancey
